title: Oberaarhorn
text: The Oberaarhorn is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Bernese%20Alps">Bernese Alps</a>, located on the border between the Swiss cantons of <a href="Valais">Valais</a> and <a href="Canton%20of%20Bern">Bern</a>. Its summit (3,629 metres) is the tripoint between the basins of the <a href="Fiescher%20Glacier">Fiesch</a> (Valais), <a href="Unteraar%20Glacier">Unteraar</a> and <a href="Oberaar%20Glacier">Oberaar Glacier</a> (Bern).
